notifications.name: Cook-AddFood
notifications.description: Grill completes preheating. Cook mode is Roast, Bake, Air Crisp, or Grill.
notifications.title: Get cooking.
notifications.body: Your grill is preheated and ready to go.

notifications.name: Cook-FlipFoodTimed
notifications.description: Grill and Air Crisp only. Cook time is greater than 6 minutes. Timer is halfway to zero. Cook mode is not  Air Crisp, Smoker, Dehydrate, or Broil. Closed-lid cook, only.
notifications.title: Time to flip.
notifications.body: We're half way through your cooking time.

notifications.name: Cook-Complete
notifications.title: Time's up.
notifications.body: Your grill will stay warm for up to 5 minutes.

notifications.name: Cook-FlipFoodProbe1
notifications.description: Grill only. Probe 1 temp is halfway between start temp and target temp. Cook mode is not  Air Crisp, Smoker, Dehydrate, or Broil.
notifications.title: Time to flip.
notifications.body: We're half way to your set internal temp.

notifications.name: Cook-FlipFoodProbe2
notifications.description: Grill only. Probe 2 temp is halfway between start temp and target temp. Cook mode is not  Air Crisp, Smoker, Dehydrate, or Broil.
notifications.title: Time to flip.
notifications.body: We're half way to your set internal temp.

notifications.name: Cook-ThermometerComplete1
notifications.title: Time to eat.
notifications.body: Thermometer 1: We've reached your set resting temp.

notifications.name: Cook-ThermometerComplete2
notifications.title: Time to eat.
notifications.body: Thermometer 2: We've reached your set resting temp.

notifications.name: Cook-RemoveFoodProbe1
notifications.description: Probe 1 reaches target temp minus offset
notifications.title: Your food is resting.
notifications.body: Thermometer 1: Remove from grill and allow to rest. It will continue to cook with residual heat to reach set temp.

notifications.name: Cook-RemoveFoodProbe2
notifications.description: Probe 2 reaches target temp minus offset
notifications.title: Your food is resting.
notifications.body: Thermometer 2: Remove from grill and allow to rest. It will continue to cook with residual heat to reach set temp.
